page.title: 15A HOLKHAM EMPLOYEE
page.content: My name is Mike Thompson and I live in Burnham Overy Staithe. I work for Lord Coke on the Holkham Hall Estate. I get up at 6.30 am every day and begin by making a cup of tea. I am then ready to eat my breakfast. After this I wash and dress before leaving for work at 7.10 am. I arrive at work at 7.30 am. I have many jobs to do at the Hall such as mounting paintings, cleaning the high ceilings and generally reaching the difficult spots! I have a tea-break at 10.00 am with another at 3.00 pm. Lunch usually lasts from 12.30 - 1.00 pm. Tired I finish work at 5.00 pm. When I get home I have a quick wash and enjoy my tea. I help my wife to wash up and then play with my children Rohan and John. In the evening I call on my mother before going to bed at 10.30 pm.
